data.title: Samantha not crooning for 'Neethane En Ponvasantham'
meta_keywords: Neethane En Ponvasantham aditya Roy Kapoor
data.meta_description: Samantha not crooning for 'Neethane En Ponvasantham' - There were reports that Samantha has sung a song in her upcoming film, Neethane En Ponvasantham, which has music by maestro Ilayaraja. But the actor has sa
data.text:
There were reports that Samantha has sung a song in her upcoming film, Neethane En Ponvasantham, which has music by maestro Ilayaraja. But the actor has said she’s not up to crooning and is unlikely to impress her fans with her singing talent

Southern beauty Samantha is gearing up for her upcoming film Neethane En Ponvasantham. However, the actor has denied all the rumours that suggested she'd be lending her voice for the music in the film. Being directed by Gautham Vasudev Menon, the project is a trilingual, being made simultaneously in Tamil, Telugu and Hindi. The Tamil version has Jiiva in the lead role, the Telugu version has Nani and Hindi has Aditya Roy Kapoor. Samantha is the heroine in all three languages.

The Bana Kathadi actor posted on her blog: “Guys I am sorry. I wish it were true and that I had a hidden talent that I was going to surprise you all with. But no, I am not singing in Gautham sir's film.” Gautham and Ilayaraja were recently in London, to record the songs and background score for the movie. “Working with Ilayaraja sir is a dream come true. He is the real maestro and it was an amazing experience,” says Gautham.
